short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight an address and click on Melissa All-In-One Lookup in the context menu to verify it on our platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up Address, Phone, Email or Company by highlighting text on a page, right-click on that text to open the context menu and select Melissa All-In-One Lookup. Our All-In-One Lookup page will open in a new tab, verifying the text using our products where applied.
